Build-Depends: cdbs, debhelper (>= 10), ghc (>= 8), ghc-prof, haskell-devscripts (>= 0.13), libghc-byteable-dev, libghc-byteable-prof, libghc-data-default-class-dev, libghc-data-default-class-prof, libghc-network-dev (>= 2.3), libghc-network-prof, libghc-socks-dev (>= 0.5.5), libghc-socks-prof, libghc-tls-dev (>= 1.3), libghc-tls-prof, libghc-x509-dev (>= 1.5), libghc-x509-prof, libghc-x509-store-dev (>= 1.5), libghc-x509-store-prof, libghc-x509-system-dev (>= 1.5), libghc-x509-system-prof, libghc-x509-validation-dev (>= 1.5), libghc-x509-validation-prof
